Author: lisa_matsuki
Text: I recommend looking for a local EDAnonymous group. They’re often led by a licensed therapist, a good intro into the treatment world, and free.   Otherwise I might look into therapists. Some insurance covers them, but if you don’t have that a lot of clinics work on a sliding scale. Usually they won’t put you into inpatient immediately unless you’re very very concerning (like deathly low weight).
